General.Name: Jeisys Medical Inc.
General.Description: Jeisys Medical Inc. designs, develops, and manufactures medical device for plastic surgeons, dermatologist, physicians, and healthcare professionals. The company offers products for treatment areas, such as fat reduction, lifting/tightening, skin rejuvenation, pigmentation treatments, hair removal, tattoo removal, scars and striae distensae, and acne under LIPOcel, ULTRAcel, ULTRAcel Q+ system, INTRAcel PRO, AcGen, Cellec V system, TRI-BEAM Premium, Edge ONE, and SmoothCool brands. It provides its products through a network of distributors in South Korea and internationally. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Room.307, Daeryung Techno Tower, Seoul, South Korea, 153-775
